name: Total Bee Spies
description:
These are dire times for bees indeed. You're a bee who just found an abandonned hive - and, of course, the Queen has ordered you to take control of it. However, it is plagued with hostile insects and you will need to thwart their patrolling to take them down. Bee discreet...

Made during 32bit jam 2021
Please, do not play this game if you have entomophobia or arachnophobia !

Controls

WASD / ← ↑↓→ to move
E to apply poison
Right click to interact with the interface buttons

Credits

Djioop - Game & Level design
Tieboudieun - Game & Level design
Infrabase - Game art & 3D
Zelirman - Game Design assist and QA

Made with Unity 2020
